text: Luíz Antônio dos Santos (6 September 1964 – 6 November 2021)Luiz Antônio dos Santos, duas vezes campeão da maratona de Chicago, morre aos 57 anos Luiz dos Santos. IAAF. Retrieved 2018-02-21. was a Brazilian male long-distance runner who specialized in the marathon. He was born in Volta Redonda, Rio de Janeiro. He was a World Championships bronze medalist. He took part of the 1996 Summer Olympics. He won the Chicago Marathon and the Fukuoka Marathon. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympians for Brazil Category:Brazilian athletes Category:Long-distance runners Category:Sportspeople from Rio de Janeiro (state)
title: Luíz Antônio dos Santos
